# location

**Type Property**

The position where the annotation applies.

## Declaration

```swift
static let location: NSAccessibility.AnnotationAttributeKey
```

## Keys

- **label**: A description of the annotation.
- **element**: The user interface element for the annotation.

items.description: The user interface element for the annotation.
items.name: element
